rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with Art Deco finishes, elegant arches, and a reception area.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: Spacious combined space designed in an open layout with decorative elements inspired by Art Deco style. Includes a bay window overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen integrated into the living area, with a Vastu-compliant placement ensuring prosperity and balance.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Functional guest bathroom aligned with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: Dedicated space on the ground floor incorporating an Art Deco styled swimming pool, bordered by stone or tiled surfaces in deep colors.

openings.description: Large bay windows on living room and dining area to allow ample natural light, respecting Vastu principles of proper sunlight distribution.
Spacious balconies attached to each bedroom for relaxation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with an adjoining balcony, en-suite bathroom, and Art Deco detailing. Placed in a Vastu-aligned corner for enhanced tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Comfortable bedroom with a spacious balcony, featuring elegant wall finishes in rich hues consistent with Art Deco style.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Functional bedroom with a balcony designed for relaxation and privacy, maintaining Vastu balance by positioning it away from direct traffic flow.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Dedicated entertainment room equipped with state-of-the-art audio-visual technology. The design incorporates plush seating, ambient lighting, and a projector screen aligned with Art Deco aesthetics.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Quiet, efficient space for work or study, strategically placed to ensure minimal distractions according to Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Each bedroom includes a well-designed balcony door that opens to the exterior, promoting ventilation and natural light.
